description: the zero-dependency, swiss-army-knife utility for building, testing, and deploying webapps
name: npmclassic

scripts.start: set -e; export PORT=${PORT:-8080}; if [ -f assets.app.js ]; then node assets.app.js; else npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 ./lib.utility2.sh shRun shIstanbulCover test.js; fi
scripts.test: PORT=$(./lib.utility2.sh shServerPortRandom) PORT_REPL=$(./lib.utility2.sh shServerPortRandom) npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 npm_config_timeout_default="${npm_config_timeout_default:-60000}" ./lib.utility2.sh test test.js
